title: 6 Things You Need to Know About Good Omens
author: IGN
comment: The Doctor is finally Ginger! Your argument is invalid.
Binge watched the whole six episodes last night .....  funny as Hell(pun intended) ... Tenant and Sheen are an excellent pairing
The first book adaptation a movie / TV show got almost perfect. Thank you Mr Gaiman, Sir PTerry would be proud of what you created.
If you look closely, the guard at the airbase was reading "American Gods" by Neil Gaiman in the episode 5.
description:
Get up to speed on the apocalyptic new Amazon Prime Video series with 6 things you need to know about Good Omens.
